document.full_text: the u.s. department of education said on tuesday it will fine virginia tech $55,000 for waiting more than two hours to alert the campus of an april 2007 shooting.
document.title: virginia tech faces $55,000 fine for 2007 shootings response
lines_and_colors: the u.s. department of education said on tuesday it will fine virginia tech $55,000 for waiting more than two hours to alert the campus of an april 2007 shooting.
